languages.text: "Помощь пострадавшим планетам — это вклад в будущее. Будущее, которого может и не быть, если не позаботиться о людях. Наконец, как собирать десятину без тех, кто трудится на благо Империума?"

"Helping the distressed planets is an investment in the future. A future which we may not live to see if we don't look after the people. Besides, how are we to collect new tithes without those who labour for the good of the Imperium?"
languages.original_text: "Помощь пострадавшим планетам — это вклад в будущее. Будущее, которого может и не быть, если не позаботиться о людях. Наконец, как собирать десятину без тех, кто трудится на благо Империума?"

"Helping the distressed planets is an investment in the future. A future which we may not live to see if we don't look after the people. Besides, how are we to collect new tithes without those who labour for the good of the Imperium?"

languages.text: «Ayudar a los planetas en apuros es una inversión de futuro, uno que tal vez no vivamos para ver si no cuidamos de la gente. Además, ¿cómo vamos a recolectar nuevos diezmos sin nadie que trabaje por el bien del Imperium?».
languages.original_text: "Helping the distressed planets is an investment in the future. A future which we may not live to see if we don't look after the people. Besides, how are we to collect new tithes without those who labour for the good of the Imperium?"

traits.locale_text: «Ayudar a los planetas en apuros es una inversión de futuro, uno que tal vez no vivamos para ver si no cuidamos de la gente. Además, ¿cómo vamos a recolectar nuevos diezmos sin nadie que trabaje por el bien del Imperium?».

languages.text: “援助那些遭受灾难的行星，这相当于对未来的投资。如果我们无法照顾好人民的福祉，恐怕我们就没有未来了。不仅如此，那些人民为了帝国的利益辛勤劳作。若是失去了他们，我们以后还怎么征税？”
languages.original_text: "Helping the distressed planets is an investment in the future. A future which we may not live to see if we don't look after the people. Besides, how are we to collect new tithes without those who labour for the good of the Imperium?"

traits.locale_text: “援助那些遭受灾难的行星，这相当于对未来的投资。如果我们无法照顾好人民的复制，恐怕我们就没有未来了。不仅如此，那些人民为了帝国的利益辛勤劳作。若是失去了他们，我们以后还怎么征税？”

languages.text: 「困窮した惑星を助けることは未来への投資です。人々を助けなければ、その未来を見ることができないかもしれません。さらに、帝国の利益のために働く者がいなければ、どうやって新しい租税を集めるのでしょうか？」
languages.original_text: "Helping the distressed planets is an investment in the future. A future which we may not live to see if we don't look after the people. Besides, how are we to collect new tithes without those who labour for the good of the Imperium?"

traits.locale_text: 「困窮した惑星を助けることは未来への投資です。人々を助けなければ、その未来を見ることができないかもしれません。さらに、帝国の利益のために働く者がいなければ、どうやって新しい租税を集めるのでしょうか？」

languages.text: "In Not geratenen Planeten zu helfen, ist eine Investition in die Zukunft. Eine Zukunft, die wir vielleicht nicht erleben, wenn wir uns nicht um die Leute kümmern. Abgesehen davon ... wie sollen wir einen neuen Zehnt eintreiben, wenn niemand mehr für das Wohl des Imperiums arbeitet?"
languages.original_text: "Helping the distressed planets is an investment in the future. A future which we may not live to see if we don't look after the people. Besides, how are we to collect new tithes without those who labour for the good of the Imperium?"

traits.locale_text: "In Not geratenen Planeten zu helfen, ist eine Investition in die Zukunft. Eine Zukunft, die wir vielleicht nicht erleben, wenn wir uns nicht um die Leute kümmern. Abgesehen davon ... wie sollen wir einen neuen Zehnt eintreiben, wenn niemand mehr für das Wohl des Imperiums arbeitet?"

languages.text: « Aider les planètes en détresse est un investissement sur l'avenir. Un avenir dans lequel nous ne serons probablement plus de ce monde si nous ne veillons pas sur leur population. Et puis, comment sommes-nous censés continuer à collecter la dîme sans les masses laborieuses qui œuvrent sans relâche au service de l'Imperium ? »
languages.original_text: "Helping the distressed planets is an investment in the future. A future which we may not live to see if we don't look after the people. Besides, how are we to collect new tithes without those who labour for the good of the Imperium?"

traits.locale_text: « Aider les planètes en détresse est un investissement sur l'avenir. Un avenir dans lequel nous ne serons probablement plus de ce monde si nous ne veillons pas sur leur population. Et puis, comment sommes-nous censés continuer à collecter la dîme sans les masses laborieuses qui œuvrent sans relâche au service de l'Imperium ? »

languages.text: "Zor durumdaki gezegenlere yardım, geleceğe yatırımdır. İnsanlara sahip çıkmazsak göremeyeceğimiz bir geleceğe. Ayrıca İmparatorluk'un iyiliği için çabalayanlar olmadan yeni aşarları nasıl toplarız?"
languages.original_text: "Helping the distressed planets is an investment in the future. A future which we may not live to see if we don't look after the people. Besides, how are we to collect new tithes without those who labour for the good of the Imperium?"

traits.locale_text: "Zor durumdaki gezegenlere yardım, geleceğe yatırımdır. İnsanlara sahip çıkmazsak göremeyeceğimiz bir geleceğe. Ayrıca İmparatorluk'un iyiliği için çabalayanlar olmadan yeni aşarları nasıl toplarız?"
